title: not possible to create new user whose name includes chinese characters
body:
### expected behaviour
it should be possible to create a new user whose name includes special characters

### actual behaviour
it is not possible, an alert message is shown letting the user know that"
"error creating user
only the following characters are allowed in a username: "a-z", "a-z", "0-9" and "_.@-"
